author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Technical, no changes expected.

Move the ROOT read rules of the SoA host collections for the ECAL digis, uncalibrated rechits, and PF rechits from classes_def.xml to classes.cc.

#### PR validation:

None.

#### Backport status

Backport of #44021 to 14.0.x for 2024 data taking.
title: Move SoA collections ROOT read rules to classes.cc [14.0.x]
